column2: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstNameWithNick]§! was once a scion of [Root.EMF_GetCadetParentHouse] with no titles to inherit, but [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] forged [Root.GetPossPronoun] own path and managed to become a prominent ruler anyway. Disconnected as [Root.GetSheHe] was from the main dynastic line and having come to prominence on [Root.GetPossPronoun] own, [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] founded the cadet §YHouse [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]§!.
Hidden trait to reduce the odds of silly stuff happening with this special character that's important to the code.
